column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Every time I come to Ba ba Reeba I am never disappointed! I always make a reservation
column2: but they have always been able to seat us 15 min early
column3: which is great. The food here is AMAZING
column4: you can come here 20 times and get different things each time. Everything tastes gourmet and I haven't found a dish I don't like here. Sangria is top notch- the pitcher is a great deal! Close to the L stop and there's usually street parking available.
